title: Lampje
overview: Lampje, based on the acclaimed book of the same name by Annet Schaap, is the magical story in four parts about the 11-year-old daughter of the lighthouse keeper. Every day when it gets dark she climbs up to turn on the light. On a stormy night everything goes wrong. This is the start of an adventure in which Lampje shows that she can do more than she ever thought possible.
